title: Custom scam
selftext:
Today I received a call from IVR saying that I have a parcel from DHL.  It was all professionally done.

When I clicked 1. It was transferred to a agent, whose English was very good and he started asking me if I had sent something to China.

I was actually planning to import something from china, so I legitimately believed everything until now.

I asked what was in the parcel, he said 1 laptop, 15 passports and 1 kg of MDMAðŸ˜‚. This is where they failed. Then I passed the time for 15 mins where he told he will transfer the call to Mumbai police station so that they can question me. Then he ended the call because I was asking too much questions ðŸ˜‚
comments: How do you guys have the guts to pick phone calls of scammers and bully them ? Mera toh koi random wrong number call bhee incoming ho toh phatt jati hai ... Uthata bhee nahi
